item.title: How celebrities are celebrating Christmas
item.description: From matching pajamas to a baby's first Christmas, here's a look at how your favorite celebrities are spending the holiday.

item.title: Japan to maximize nuclear power in clean-energy push as electricity demand grows
item.description: A Japanese government panel has largely supported a draft energy policy calling for bolstering renewables up to half of Japanese electricity needs by ...

item.title: WATCH: Millions wake up to a white Christmas
item.description: Plus, storms and tech issues cause travel headaches. ABC News' Andrew Dymburt reports.

item.title: WATCH: Robin Roberts' nephew shares journey as a stem cell donor
item.description: "GMA" shares the story of Jeremiah Craft, who became a stem cell donor after his mom Sally-Ann told him to sign up for the NMDP registry.
